verses.text: Whose \w helper|strong="H5826"\w* art thou? \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w of|strong="H2220"\w* \w him|strong="H5826"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w is|strong="H4100"\w* \w weak|strong="H3808"\w*? \w and|strong="H5797"\w* dost thou hold up \w the|strong="H3808"\w* \w arm|strong="H2220"\w* \w of|strong="H2220"\w* \w him|strong="H5826"\w* \w that|strong="H3808"\w* \w has|strong="H4100"\w* \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w strength|strong="H5797"\w*?

\w To|strong="H3045"\w* whom hast thou \w given|strong="H3289"\w* \w counsel|strong="H3289"\w*? perhaps \w to|strong="H3045"\w* \w him|strong="H3045"\w* \w that|strong="H3045"\w* hath \w no|strong="H3808"\w* \w wisdom|strong="H2451"\w*, \w and|strong="H2451"\w* thou hast shewn thy \w very|strong="H3045"\w* \w great|strong="H7230"\w* prudence.

\w Whom|strong="H4310"\w* hast thou desired \w to|strong="H3318"\w* teach? \w was|strong="H5397"\w* it not \w him|strong="H5046"\w* \w that|strong="H4480"\w* \w made|strong="H5046"\w* \w life|strong="H5397"\w*?

Behold \w the|strong="H8478"\w* giants groan \w under|strong="H8478"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w and|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H8478"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w dwell|strong="H7931"\w* \w with|strong="H4325"\w* \w them|strong="H8478"\w*.

Hell \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w naked|strong="H6174"\w* \w before|strong="H5048"\w* \w him|strong="H5048"\w*, \w and|strong="H7585"\w* \w there|strong="H0369"\w* \w is|strong="H0369"\w* \w no|strong="H0369"\w* \w covering|strong="H3682"\w* for \w destruction|strong="H0011"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* \w stretched|strong="H5186"\w* \w out|strong="H5186"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w north|strong="H6828"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w empty|strong="H8414"\w* \w space|strong="H8414"\w*, \w and|strong="H0776"\w* hangeth \w the|strong="H5921"\w* \w earth|strong="H0776"\w* \w upon|strong="H5921"\w* \w nothing|strong="H8414"\w*.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* bindeth \w up|strong="H1234"\w* \w the|strong="H8478"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w* \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w his|strong="H8478"\w* \w clouds|strong="H5645"\w*, \w so|strong="H3808"\w* \w that|strong="H4325"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* \w break|strong="H1234"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w out|strong="H1234"\w* \w and|strong="H4325"\w* fall down \w together|strong="H8478"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5921"\w* withholdeth \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w face|strong="H6440"\w* \w of|strong="H6440"\w* \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w throne|strong="H3678"\w*, \w and|strong="H6440"\w* spreadeth \w his|strong="H5921"\w* \w cloud|strong="H6051"\w* \w over|strong="H5921"\w* \w it|strong="H5921"\w*.

\w He|strong="H5704"\w* hath set bounds \w about|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H6440"\w* \w waters|strong="H4325"\w*, \w till|strong="H5704"\w* \w light|strong="H0216"\w* \w and|strong="H6440"\w* \w darkness|strong="H2822"\w* come \w to|strong="H5704"\w* \w an|strong="H6440"\w* \w end|strong="H8503"\w*.

\w The|strong="H8064"\w* \w pillars|strong="H5982"\w* \w of|strong="H5982"\w* \w heaven|strong="H8064"\w* \w tremble|strong="H7322"\w*, \w and|strong="H8064"\w* dread \w at|strong="H8539"\w* his beck.

By his \w power|strong="H3581"\w* \w the|strong="H4272"\w* \w seas|strong="H3220"\w* are suddenly gathered \w together|strong="H3220"\w*, \w and|strong="H3220"\w* his \w wisdom|strong="H8394"\w* \w has|strong="H3220"\w* \w struck|strong="H4272"\w* \w the|strong="H4272"\w* proud one.

\w His|strong="H3027"\w* \w spirit|strong="H7307"\w* hath adorned \w the|strong="H3027"\w* \w heavens|strong="H8064"\w*, \w and|strong="H3027"\w* \w his|strong="H3027"\w* obstetric \w hand|strong="H3027"\w* \w brought|strong="H3027"\w* forth \w the|strong="H3027"\w* winding \w serpent|strong="H5175"\w*.

\w Lo|strong="H2005"\w*, \w these|strong="H0428"\w* \w things|strong="H1697"\w* \w are|strong="H0428"\w* \w said|strong="H1697"\w* \w in|strong="H8085"\w* \w part|strong="H7098"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w ways|strong="H1870"\w*: \w and|strong="H1870"\w* seeing \w we|strong="H8085"\w* \w have|strong="H1697"\w* \w heard|strong="H8085"\w* scarce \w a|strong="H8085"\w* little drop \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* \w word|strong="H1697"\w*, \w who|strong="H4310"\w* \w shall|strong="H4310"\w* \w be|strong="H1697"\w* able \w to|strong="H8085"\w* \w behold|strong="H2005"\w* \w the|strong="H8085"\w* \w thunder|strong="H7482"\w* \w of|strong="H1697"\w* \w his|strong="H8085"\w* greatness?
